description: Many options, but only the needed ones
What is only pity that in Fedora 28 it's not a latest version yet.
i have seen so far. I like the dynamic playlist very much.

Cantata stands out from the crowd of audio players trying their hand at replication, bypassing MPD and relying on its own database. Cantata's GUI is informative and well thought out. Its options are numerous and well explained, even custom actions can be set up. The teaming of MPD, Cantata, Kid3 and Dolphin provides the foundation for sophisticated music management and enjoyment.
Para mi gusto el mejor reproductor de todos sin duda.

Es genial por simplicidad y posibilidades . Solia usar clementine pero sus habituales fallos de info de cancion y artista me han decantado por este gestor-reproductor. Si tengo que decir algo es que ya seria la repanocha alguna configuracion chula de la apariencia . Para mi es perfecta la app.
